alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 9:15AM MST until December 25 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST SATURDAY ABOVE 7500 FEET... * WHAT...Periods of snow this morning becoming snow showers this afternoon through Saturday. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches, with locally higher accumulations up to 10 to 12 inches above 8000 ft. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 7500 feet near Buffalo Pass. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Additional snow forecast from 9 AM Today to 11 PM Saturday: Buffalo Pass 3 to 5 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
